questions.question: What is your biggest fear?
Do 10 pushups.
Have you ever lied to get out of a situation?
Sing a song of your choice.
What's the most embarrassing thing you've ever done?
Dance for 30 seconds.
What is your guilty pleasure?
Let someone give you a silly hairstyle.
If you could be invisible for a day, what's the first thing you would do?
Yell out the first word that comes to your mind.
Have you ever stolen anything?
Post an embarrassing photo on social media.
What's one thing you love most about yourself?
Close your eyes until your next turn.
If you could switch lives with anyone for a day, who would it be?
Do an impression of someone in the room.
What's the most rebellious thing you've ever done?
Pretend to be a waiter and take drink orders from everyone.
What’s a secret you've never told anyone?
Talk in an accent of your choice for 2 minutes.
What's the last thing you Googled?
Eat a spoonful of mustard or hot sauce.
Have you ever had a crush on someone in this room?
Imitate an animal of your choice for 1 minute.
If you could travel anywhere right now, where would you go?
Take a selfie and post it on your story without any explanation.
What's the most awkward thing you've said to someone?
Do your best dance move for 1 minute.
What’s something you’ve never told your best friend?
Try to touch your toes while balancing on one foot.
Have you ever broken something and not told anyone?
Send a text to the 5th person in your contact list.
What’s the craziest thing you’ve ever done on a dare?
Do 20 jumping jacks in a row.
What’s the worst date you’ve ever been on?
Call someone and sing them 'Happy Birthday' – even if it's not their birthday.
What’s one thing you wish you could change about your past?
Do an impression of someone in the room until someone guesses who it is.
What’s the most embarrassing thing you've done for attention?
Let someone else pick a song for you to sing.
What’s something you're really proud of?
Pretend you're a news anchor and report the most dramatic story you can think of.
What’s your biggest pet peeve?
Do your best celebrity impression for 2 minutes.
Have you ever been caught doing something you shouldn't have?
Give someone in the room a compliment.
What’s your guilty pleasure TV show?
Run around the room 5 times while shouting 'I love Truth or Dare!'
What’s one thing you’re really bad at?
Try to juggle with 3 items.
If you won the lottery, what’s the first thing you would do?
Post an embarrassing status on social media and leave it up for 10 minutes.
What’s the most daring thing you've ever done?
Act like a superhero for the next 3 minutes.
Have you ever ghosted someone?
Speak in a rhyming sentence for the next 3 rounds.
What’s your biggest regret?
Wear socks on your hands for the next 5 minutes.
If you could switch lives with any fictional character, who would it be?
Post a picture of your feet on social media.
What’s something you’ve always wanted to try but haven’t yet?
Do your best impersonation of your favorite cartoon character.
Have you ever had a crush on a teacher?
Speak in a dramatic Shakespearean accent for the next 2 rounds.
